snippet: On Tuesday, BuzzFeed will take over the science museum in Charlotte, N.C., and allow conventioneers to mix with other party animals.
abstract: On Tuesday, BuzzFeed will take over the science museum in Charlotte, N.C., and allow conventioneers to mix with other party animals.

byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and ASHLEY PARKER

headline.main: Social Media Site Creates Buzz With Convention Parties
